member.name: M:Oragon.Architecture.Web.SpringApplicationContext.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value if the current application context contains an named object.
member.param: Accepts the name of the object to check.

member.name: M:Oragon.Architecture.Web.SpringApplicationContext.Resolve(System.String)
member.summary: Return a instance of an object in the context by the specified name.

member.name: M:Oragon.Architecture.Web.SpringApplicationContext.Resolve``1(System.String)
member.summary: Return a instance of an object in the context by the specified name and type.
member.typeparam: Accepts the type of the object to resolve.
